import React, { useState, Fragment } from "react"; import { LockClosedIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import Loader from "../../components/shared/Loader"; import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { CheckIcon, ExclamationIcon } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { forgotPassword } from "../../api/usersApi"; export default function ForgotPassword() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [open1, setOpen1] = useState(false); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); try { await forgotPassword({ email }); setLoading(false); setOpen(true); } catch (error) { setLoading(false); setOpen1(true); } }; return (
